definition: romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)

sentences.english: I really love is not easy to close, hate old brothels, from whom the same were drunk?

sentences.english: The unrelated temptress, a yearning heart in hometown, hometown.
sentences.chinese: 此时无关风月，只道秋思故乡，心系在故里。

sentences.english: His individual photo selection of landscape has been published.
sentences.chinese: 出版有个人摄影专辑《风月》。

sentences.english: Say a sentence to disappoint you of words, maybe he was a romantic veteran.

definition: distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
wind, flower, snow and moon, trite poetry subject (idiom); effete language without substance/love affair/romance is in the air/dissipated life
poetic occasion/elegant situation/in literature, the cue for a poem
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
lit. singing of the wind and the moon; fig. vacuous and sentimental (of poetry or art)
